name: Iphone 12
description: The latest flagship smartphone from Apple. Experience blazing fast performance, stunning photography, and all-day battery life with this sleek and powerful device.

additionalDetails.camera: Quad-camera setup with 108 MP main sensor

name: HP Omen
description: Power through your workday with the ultra-portable and high-performance laptop from HP. Featuring a stunning display, lightning-fast SSD storage, and all-day battery life, this laptop is perfect for professionals on the go.

name: Wireless Headphone
description: Immerse yourself in your favorite music with these premium wireless earbuds from Oraimo. With active noise cancellation, sweat and water resistance, and a comfortable ergonomic design, these earbuds are perfect for workouts, commutes, and everyday use.

additionalDetails.batteryLife: Up to 8 hours on a single charge
additionalDetails.chargingCase: Provides an additional 24 hours of battery life

name: IWatch 3
description: Stay connected and track your fitness goals with the latest smartwatch from Apple. With advanced health monitoring features, built-in GPS, and a sleek design, this smartwatch is your perfect companion for an active lifestyle.

additionalDetails.sensors: Heart rate monitor, SpO2 sensor, Accelerometer, Gyroscope
additionalDetails.batteryLife: Up to 7 days on a single charge
